basic_info.description: Being a Full-stack Developer with a wide range of technical skills and experience working with various programming languages and full-stack technologies. I have experience working on SAAS web applications using Django and React, and have also worked with Spring, Hibernate, and Node.js. With a Master's degree in Information Systems and have taken relevant courses in web development, data management, and data science engineering. I have also worked as a Software Developer Intern, Full-stack Engineer Intern, and Co-Founder and Business Intelligence Manager. My experience in software development, collaboration with cross-functional teams, and marketing makes me a well-rounded candidate for positions that require both technical and business acumen. projects.title: Resume Screening for HireBeat
projects.description: Resume parsing refers to the automated scanning, extraction, storage, and analysis of resumes. By identifying and organizing relevant information, such as job skills, work experience, contact information, and so forth, parsing software can save recruiters countless hours.

projects.title: Talent Sourcing for HireBeat
projects.description: Identify top talent for your specific job opening with our unique candidate sourcing feature. Also known as ‚ÄúPassive sourcing,‚Äù job candidate sourcing is often the secret to success when hiring. Our human in the loop process leverages AI and uses your required skills, education, and more to find potential candidates for your open role.
